title: Microsoft promoting the power of AI for businesses and government
text: The world’s biggest public company, Microsoft has come to Australia with its global roadshow about artificial intelligence. The tech giant brought key executives to promote the power of artificial intelligence for business, government, and software developers. Big AI adopters already include banks, utilities, and insurance companies – who use it to sift through mountains of data. The message is that plenty more sectors can benefit – notably mining and agriculture. Corporate Vice President Cloud & AI Commercial Marketing Alysa Taylor joined Sky News Business Reporter Ed Boyd to discuss artificial intelligence. Read More Our Apps
